title: The Happy Island
creator_credit: Ann Gurr, Shan Benson, Maslyn Williams, Australian National Film Board and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Gemo Island Hospital, Papua, seen through the eyes of one of the nurses. As well as general wards separate blocks for T.B. and leprosy cases are maintained and within them, three schools are run.
creator_credit_for_label: Ann Gurr, Shan Benson, Maslyn Williams, Australian National Film Board and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
